title: How to Make S'more Egg Rolls

steps.headline: Prepare your frying oil.
steps.description: Add vegetable oil, such as safflower or canola, to a wok or deep pan and put it on a medium high heat. Be sure to leave at least two inches from the top to avoid oil spillage.

steps.headline: Prepare the chocolate.
steps.description: Separate the bars into pieces or spoon the chocolate spread into a sandwich plastic bag. You can snip off the bottom corner of the bag and create a mini pastry bag.

steps.headline: Position the egg wrapper in a diamond shape in front of you.
steps.description: Add the chocolate in the center of the wrapper, followed by the marshmallows on top.

steps.headline: Fold the wrapper.
steps.description:
Take the corner of the wrapper nearest to you and fold it over the ingredients. {"smallUrl":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/4/47/Smore-Rolls_87.JPG/460px-Smore-Rolls_87.JPG","bigUrl":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/4/47/Smore-Rolls_87.JPG","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":307,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":506.6666666666667,"licensing":"

"} Dab the top ends with a very thin layer of whisked eggs. Roll the wrapper up and seal the ends. {"smallUrl":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/7/71/Smore-Rolls_739.JPG/460px-Smore-Rolls_739.JPG","bigUrl":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/7/71/Smore-Rolls_739.JPG","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":307,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":506.6666666666667,"licensing":"

"}

steps.headline: Slide it into the hot oil.
steps.description: Deep fry the egg rolls until golden in color and crispy on both sides.

steps.headline: Finish the egg rolls with garnishes.
steps.description: Dust the egg rolls with powdered sugar and sprinkle the graham cracker crumbs.

text:
Prepare your frying oil. Add vegetable oil, such as safflower or canola, to a wok or deep pan and put it on a medium high heat. Be sure to leave at least two inches from the top to avoid oil spillage. Prepare the chocolate. Separate the bars into pieces or spoon the chocolate spread into a sandwich plastic bag. You can snip off the bottom corner of the bag and create a mini pastry bag. Position the egg wrapper in a diamond shape in front of you. Add the chocolate in the center of the wrapper, followed by the marshmallows on top. Fold the wrapper. Take the corner of the wrapper nearest to you and fold it over the ingredients. {"smallUrl":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/4/47/Smore-Rolls_87.JPG/460px-Smore-Rolls_87.JPG","bigUrl":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/4/47/Smore-Rolls_87.JPG","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":307,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":506.6666666666667,"licensing":"

Taken by Maluniu

License: Creative Commons


"} Fold in the sides on top of the first fold. {"smallUrl":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/9/9b/Smore-Rolls_647.JPG/460px-Smore-Rolls_647.JPG","bigUrl":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/9/9b/Smore-Rolls_647.JPG","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":312,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":514.9112426035502,"licensing":"

Taken by Maluniu

License: Creative Commons


"} Dab the top ends with a very thin layer of whisked eggs. Roll the wrapper up and seal the ends. {"smallUrl":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/7/71/Smore-Rolls_739.JPG/460px-Smore-Rolls_739.JPG","bigUrl":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/7/71/Smore-Rolls_739.JPG","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":307,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":506.6666666666667,"licensing":"

Taken by Maluniu

License: Creative Commons


"} Slide it into the hot oil. Deep fry the egg rolls until golden in color and crispy on both sides. Drain on paper towels. Finish the egg rolls with garnishes. Dust the egg rolls with powdered sugar and sprinkle the graham cracker crumbs.
